overview: A small robotic cow was looking for its mother in the slaughterhouse. After witnessing its killing by a robotic butcher, it began a frantic escape. After fighting tenaciously with the robotic butcher, it finally escaped the slaughter in the slaughterhouse.
tagline: A small robotic cow was looking for its mother in the slaughterhouse. After witnessing its killing by a robotic butcher, it began a frantic escape. After fighting tenaciously with the robotic butcher, it finally escaped the slaughter in the slaughterhouse.
title: Happy Meal Horror
